parameters.name: ChangeOrderId
parameters.description: The ID of the change order.

parameters.name: CreateTime
parameters.description: The time when the change order was created.

parameters.name: MetricType
parameters.description: The type of the metric that you want to query.

parameters.name: Pid
parameters.description: The ID of the Enterprise Distributed Application Service (EDAS) or Kubernetes application.

parameters.name: ProxyUserId
parameters.description: This parameter is not in use.

parameters.name: ReleaseEndTime
parameters.description: The end time of the version release.

parameters.name: ReleaseStartTime
parameters.description: The start time of the version release.

parameters.name: Service
parameters.description: The service that you want to query.
